FuncDef:
The ipv4-family mdt command enables the BGP-Multicast Distribution Tree (MDT) address family and displays the address family view.
The undo ipv4-family mdt command deletes the configurations in the BGP-MDT address family.
By default, the BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view is displayed.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The ipv4-family mdt command enables the BGP-Multicast Distribution Tree (MDT) address family and displays the address family view.
Configuration Impact
To disable the IPv4 unicast address family, run the undo default ipv4-unicast command.
